other_tests.findings: The right kidney measures 8.2 cm. The left kidney measures 10.3 cm. There is no hydronephrosis, stones, or masses bilaterally. There is thinning of the right renal cortex. The resistive indices on the right are 0.81, 0.67, 0.87. Spectral Doppler evaluation of the right renal artery demonstrates a delayed acceleration time without increased velocity. The left resistive indices measure 0.75, 0.84, 0.87. Spectral Doppler evaluation of the left renal artery demonstrates a mildly delayed acceleration time without increased velocity. The bladder is moderately well distended and normal in appearance.
Leukocytosis with neutrophil predominance, INR 2.9, Cr 2.7 (baseline), troponin <0.01.
